examples.example: 他不仅学习成绩优秀，而且非常有礼貌。

translate.english: He not only has excellent academic performance, but also is very polite.

examples.example: 她不仅工作能力很强，而且待人十分友善。

translate.english: She not only has strong working ability, but also is very friendly to others.

examples.example: 他为人正直，而且充满热情，总是能给身边的人带来温暖和力量。

translate.english: He is an upright person and full of enthusiasm, and always can bring warmth and strength to the people around him.
